CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Save meeting content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative annotations, available now, enable meeting participants with the Presenter role to enable annotations after sharing their screen. This allows everyone in the meeting to draw, add a note, react, highlight text, and more to share their thoughts right on the content, live with everyone else. Now, participants sharing their screen will have the ability to save content with collaborative annotations as a Whiteboard, enabling all meeting participants to revisit this content and continue collaborating after the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider Risk Management supports multicloud environments
OldVersion.description: ,Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

The video file will be sent to the Recycle Bin of the OneDrive or SharePoint page the video was hosted on and any access to the video will lead to a page informing the user that the video has been removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

Admins can also define attributes for their teams that range from department information to brand information. The operational hierarchy coupled with this added metadata will enable numerous frontline apps and experiences in the future like task publishing and additional frontline capabilities that are coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Contribute to topics from the expanded topic card
CurrentVersion.description:
Expanded view of the topic card will now allow users to review the information on the topic and make quick edits to improve the topic.

This feature will not continue rolling out. Please refer to upcoming changes to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.

More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: New ‘notes’ tab when creating a standard Teams channel
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new standard channel, a new Notes tab will be automatically created. Each Teams team will have a dedicated OneNote workbook and each channel will have its own section, making it easier on the workgroup to add their notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users searching from Microsoft Search surfaces will be able to find content from Answers in Viva that match their search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
CurrentVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: User Submission Automatic Feedback Response
CurrentVersion.description: The user submission automatic feedback response enables organizations to automatically respond to end user submissions of phish based on the verdict from the automated investigation. This feature is configurable and allows organizations to dictate in which threat scenarios they would like end users to receive feedback emails. Once enabled, Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) will automatically respond to end user submissions based on the investigation verdict and the configured settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Draft by Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can now help you draft new messages or replies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: MyTopics for all users in a Topics tenant
CurrentVersion.description:
,If your tenant has completed AI-indexing, a very small subset of topics will now be available to all users, even without an assigned Topics license. Any user in your organization will be able to view their associated "MyTopics" that appear in their "suggested" and "confirmed" connection webparts of Topic Center home, the Topic adaptive card for Viva Connections, and the People Profile card. They can confirm or remove these associations.

This feature will not rollout. Please refer to changes coming to Topics: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/topics/changes-coming-to-topics?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inactive teams and inactive domains report export capability
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to export the inactive teams and inactive domains reports to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Enriched Data Loss Prevention Alert Email Notifications for DLP Admins
CurrentVersion.description: ,There is now increased information in the alert email notification sent to the Data Loss Prevention (DLP) admin upon a DLP policy match. Previously a DLP alert email only included the user activity and the type of sensitive information matched in the alert. Now, DLP admins will get additional context such as alert ID, policy details, device details, and more. This will help admins quickly assess the priority of an alert and determine the next steps before navigating to the Microsoft Purview DLP alerts page or Microsoft 365 Defender DLP alerts page.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
CurrentVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in Viva Learning acts as a virtual learning companion, assisting users throughout their learning journey and providing personalized guidance, recommendations, and ability to take actions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage question post update
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage is updating its questions to include two parts: a required field for the main question and an optional larger field for extra details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Support for Content camera on new Teams app experience for Windows and Mac. Content camera enables remote attendees to get a clear view of physical objects like whiteboards, printed documents, books, and more that are in a meeting room. Content camera intelligently detects, crops and frames the in-room object and shares its content with remote meeting participants. Even when a presenter moves in front of it, for example the whiteboard, remote participants will be able to see the content right through them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Code Snippets in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
Users will be able to add code snippets to their posts, discussions, replies, questions, polls, and praises on Viva Engage. 

Additionally, if customers are licensed for Answers in Viva Engage, this feature will also be available when asking questions on Answers.

To add code snippets, locate the new </> button on the publisher toolbar.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: Bookings in GCC High and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Bookings will be available to customers in GCC High and DoD environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams for Education: iOS/Android Parent link for School Connection
CurrentVersion.description: Allows parents to connect to School Connection in Teams for Education by clicking the iOS/Android mobile link provided by their school’s administration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance-Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External domain activity report export capability
CurrentVersion.description: Export the ‘External domain activity’ report to a csv file in Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Microsoft 365 in Teams chat on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily access Copilot on the Teams mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enable/Disable Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will be able to enable or disable the entire Unstructured, Structured, and Prebuilt Document Processing services.  Disabling the service prevents any models of this type from running.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Microsoft Copilot with graph grounded chat in the Microsoft 365 mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 mobile app users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational graph data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: ,To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Work account support in Clipchamp's desktop app
CurrentVersion.description:
The updated Clipchamp desktop app introduces work account support and lets users with AAD/Entra ID accounts directly access Clipchamp for work through the desktop app for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Users of Clipchamp for work will be able to access the video editor in the app without using a browser. Microsoft 365 administrators can control if their users are able to access both Clipchamp for work and Clipchamp for personal accounts via the app or only Clipchamp for work.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/topic/how-to-enable-or-disable-clipchamp-for-users-in-your-organization-5b74028f-6dd8-423c-a6cb-8e2b8b42c6e7#bkmk_app_access

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium Content Query - Columns in new libraries are queryable
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, columns in newly created libraries by licensed users are all made available to content query. Also, users can trigger an action to make all columns in existing libraries available to content query.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting details displayed on pre-join screen
CurrentVersion.description: Available for in-tenant participants, the meeting pre-join screen will now include contextual information about the meeting like meeting title, scheduled start time, scheduled end time, and number of participants who have joined the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Delete option in Stream Web App
CurrentVersion.description: Stream is adding a delete option to the Stream Web App. If a user has editing permissions to a video in Stream, they will be able to delete a video directly from the Stream Web App by clicking the delete button on the command bar and confirming the action. The video file will be sent to the Recycle Bin of the OneDrive or SharePoint page the video was hosted on and any access to the video will lead to a page informing the user that the video has been removed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: First Run Experience
CurrentVersion.description: First-time users of Microsoft Stream will see informational modals that explain what Stream is and its basic functionality. Users will be able to close these modals at any step. When the tenant acquires new premium functionalities, such as Copilot in Stream, more modals will be displayed explaining the new functionalities.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Copilot integration with the file viewer in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneDrive will soon be available from the file viewer in Microsoft 365 for customers with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license. Clicking on the Copilot icon in the file viewer will open the Copilot chat panel which will allow you to summarize or get information from your files in OneDrive or SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint Pages: New Section Level Content Align
CurrentVersion.description: With Section Level Content Align, authors will now be able to center and bottom align all the webparts within a single section. This will make it easier for all of the columns in your section to be visually harmonious and reduce the need for the spacer webpart.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Desktop Shortcut for New Enterprise Devices
CurrentVersion.description: For new enterprise devices running through Windows Out of Box Experience (OOBE) for the first time, an Edge desktop shortcut will automatically be created. When enterprise users turn on their Windows 11 devices for the first time, they'll see the Edge shortcut on their desktop. This desktop shortcut will provide users with easy access to their Edge browser without needing to manually pin and configure their setup.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updated reauthentication flyout when Web Single Sign-On fails
CurrentVersion.description: Users who encounter Web Single Sign-On (SSO) failures for User Interaction Required (UIR) accounts will experience a flyout with a call to action to sign in and verify their account.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Analytics in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The customer facing analytics module will allow customers to understand the usage metrics for their instance of Viva Connections and will help them gauge the health of their VC deployment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on tablet in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing, or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Revamped Resources on mobile and tablet
CurrentVersion.description: The Resources section on Viva Connections mobile and tablet will show content from the recently revamped Resources section on Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Recurring meetings in Meetings view
CurrentVersion.description: The upcoming update to the OneDrive Meetings view will display your recurring meetings in chronological order, providing easy access to all related files, past recordings, and details like the meeting owner, attendees, time, and location. This feature helps you prepare for future meetings by allowing you to quickly access pre-read materials and review recordings or content from past meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Image background removal in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: ,You can remove a background from your image and photos using AI.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling call forwarding directly from phone device home screen through Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Users can enable call forwarding directly from phone device home screen (including common area phones). Admins can control display of call forwarding on phone device home screen through Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Advanced calling and contact management support on non-touch phones
CurrentVersion.description: On non-touch phones users can use advanced calling features such as park/unpark calls, busy on busy, auto restart, and manage contacts and contact groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Files Card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: The feature helps organizations add a view of files which were recently accessed, shared or marked favorite by the user. This file view can be added in the form of card on Viva Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Teams Integrations with OneNote Meeting Details
CurrentVersion.description: In addition to basic information about a meeting such as date, description, and attendees, Meeting Details will now add content from Teams’ intelligent meeting recap. This includes AI-generated meeting notes, AI-suggested tasks, and any documents shared during the Teams meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workspace Management
CurrentVersion.description: We are not releasing this feature at this time and apologize for any inconvenience. Workspace Management is a new feature within Teams Admin Center that provides an integrated view of Teams devices and peripherals based on their location, along with relevant insights. This capability provides IT admins the ability to manage connected devices, and monitor workspace health, utilization and conformance to standards at any location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.title:
Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Prioritize analysis
of policy-driven alerts with Azure Cognitive Services
CurrentVersion.description:
,Leveraging Azure Cognitive Services, messages already matching policy conditions will be categorized in “positive,” “negative,” or “neutral” sentiment, giving policy investigators more context to prioritize potentially riskier messages to address first.Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Browser-optimized playback for SAP SuccessFactors content
CurrentVersion.description: Desktop client content consumption for SuccessFactors content is enhanced with browser optimized playback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Managed Services: Bulk suppression of rooms enrolled in Managed Services
CurrentVersion.description: Workflow to turn off all signals for rooms and specify when the signals need to be turned back on.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent message translation in chats
CurrentVersion.description: When you get a message in a different language, you will see translation suggested to help you understand it better. In the settings, you can select which languages you don't want to translate, and whether to translate messages automatically.
